Key Match Events: The Kings went on a 17-2 run to end the third quarter and take an 83-77 lead.
Sacramento started the fourth on an 11-4 run, extending the lead to double digits on a 3-pointer by Trey Lyles.
Pre-Game Insights: Doug Christie gets 1st win after taking over for Mike Brown
Post-Match Reflections: Doug Christie expressed pride in his team's effort after the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dallas Mavericks guard Spencer Dinwiddie drove to the basket past Sacramento Kings forward Keegan Murray during the first half
